name: Imriaz Uddin Eman
review: First, this course is very well structured. The ability of the tutor in explaining advanced concepts of the JS just is tremendous.

name: Ayesha Nusrat Meem
review: What a valuable course even it's from 2015. This completely changed the way I am thinking the JS language. Just loved it.

name: Naimur Rahman Rafi
review: It is awesome to know what happens behind scene of the program. That helps understanding for debugging errors.

name: Syma Nusrat Ananya
review: This course is really outdated and i think you don't have any reason to take this course in 2022 because this course is based on ES-5.

name: Hafiz Uddin Raju
review: This course made a lot of things clear to me. Now I feel I will be able to jump to NodeJs easily.

name: Prosenjit Ray pappu
review: Thank you, Anthony Alicea, for providing this course, describing how JavaScript is running on the back end.
